Replace.Text: A district unique to Zulu which replaces the Encampment. Provides +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Once the Civic or Technology prerequisite is met, Corps and Armies can be built outright. Buildings in the Ikanda receive +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Faster Corps and Army creation. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] towards Military Engineers.
May form Corps (Mercenaries Civic) and Armies (Nationalism Civic) earlier. An additional +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Base Combat Strength to Corps at (Nationalism Civic) and Armies at (Mobilization Civic).

Zulu unique Medieval Era unit that replaces the Pikeman. Increased Flanking bonus, low cost and low maintenance. Earns XP faster. +5 [ICON_STRENGTH] bonus against cavalry instead of the usual +10 [ICON_STRENGTH]
